cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration

Class FrameworkConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration.Configuration
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.configuration.FrameworkConfiguration

  • public class FrameworkConfiguration
extends Configuration
    This class holds configuration that should store values that are important on the top level of the application. (Not dependent on bot etc.) It should be loaded from config.cfg file. This class implements singleton pattern.
    Author:
    Banzindun
